item.title: [cmr] Portent of Betrayal
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [cmr] Renegade Tactics
item.description:
Sorcery

Target creature can't block this turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Rummaging Goblin
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Rogue

{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Ripscale Predator
item.description:
Creature — Dinosaur

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [cmr] Skyraker Giant
item.description:
Creature — Giant

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [cmr] Stonefury
item.description:
Instant

Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

item.title: [cmr] Sparktongue Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [cmr] Volcanic Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

item.title: [cmr] Undying Rage
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.

When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

item.title: [cmr] Volcanic Torrent
item.description:
Sorcery

Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Volcanic Torrent deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Ambush Viper
item.description:
Creature — Snake

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

item.title: [cmr] Crushing Vines
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target creature with flying.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [cmr] Fin-Clade Fugitives
item.description:
Creature — Elf Salamander Rogue

Fin-Clade Fugitives can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Encore {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Lifecrafter's Gift
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Ivy Lane Denizen
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Lys Alana Bowmaster
item.description:
Creature — Elf Archer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

item.title: [cmr] Monstrous Onslaught
item.description:
Sorcery

Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.

item.title: [cmr] Molder Beast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Trample

Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [cmr] Reshape the Earth
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to ten land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Ordeal of Nylea
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.

When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Scrounging Bandar
item.description:
Creature — Cat Monkey

Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.

item.title: [cmr] Scaled Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [cmr] Sentinel Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

item.title: [cmr] Stingerfling Spider
item.description:
Creature — Spider

Reach

When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

item.title: [cmr] Silverback Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Ape Shaman

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Wildsize
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [cmr] Strength of the Pack
item.description:
Sorcery

Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

item.title: [cmr] Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Note the converted mana cost of each card as it's put into exile.

Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [cmr] Captain Vargus Wrath
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Orc Pirate

Whenever Captain Vargus Wrath attacks, Pirates you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.

item.title: [cmr] Hamza, Guardian of Arashin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elephant Warrior

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [cmr] Jared Carthalion, True Heir
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

When Jared Carthalion, True Heir enters the battlefield, target opponent becomes the monarch. You can't become the monarch this turn.

If damage would be dealt to Jared Carthalion while you're the monarch, prevents that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [cmr] Kwain, Itinerant Meddler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rabbit Wizard

{T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.

item.title: [cmr] Karador, Ghost Chieftain
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Centaur Spirit

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

During each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.

item.title: [cmr] Marath, Will of the Wild
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental Beast

Marath, Will of the Wild enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it.

{X}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Marath: Choose one —

• Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature. X can't be 0.

• Marath deals X damage to any target. X can't be 0.

• Create an X/X green Elemental creature token. X can't be 0.

item.title: [cmr] Zedruu the Greathearted
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Minotaur Monk

At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanents you own that your opponents control.

{U}{R}{W}: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

item.title: [cmr] Amorphous Axe
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and is every creature type.

Equip {3}

item.title: [cmr] Angelic Armaments
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a white Angel in addition to its other colors and types.

Equip {4}

item.title: [cmr] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [cmr] Brass Herald
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

item.title: [cmr] Dreamstone Hedron
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

item.title: [cmr] Codex Shredder
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Target player mills a card.

{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Codex Shredder: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Foundry Inspector
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [cmr] Grafted Wargear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+2.

Whenever Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent.

Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [cmr] Hero's Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+2.

Whenever a legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Hero's Blade to it.

Equip {4}

item.title: [cmr] Haunted Cloak
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has vigilance, trample, and haste.

Equip {1}

item.title: [cmr] Jalum Tome
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

item.title: [cmr] Howling Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.

item.title: [cmr] Lumengrid Gargoyle
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Gargoyle

Flying

item.title: [cmr] Loreseeker's Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Draw three cards. This ability costs {1} more to activate for each card in your hand.

item.title: [cmr] Pennon Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.

Equip {4}
